page.description: Get the definition of a DBF table from an open table or by name.

prototypes.prototype: Result_Flag as L = SQL::TableInfo GetTableInfoFromDBF(Info BYREF as SQL::TableInfo, Table as P)
Result_Flag as L = SQL::TableInfo GetTableInfoFromDBF(Info BYREF as SQL::TableInfo, Table as C)

argument.name: Info BYREF
argument.description: A SQL::TableInfo object where the table definition will be stored.

argument.name: TableName
argument.description: An open table or DBF table name.

return.name: Result_Flag
return.description: Returns TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

page.discussion: The GetTableInfoFromDBF() method retrieves the definition of a DBF table.
